flawed_nl_solution:
The age of Jeremy three years from now will be 40+3 = <<40+3=43>>43 years
Since Sebastian age is four years more than Jeremy's, Sebastian is currently 40+4 = 44 years.
In three years, Sebastian will be 44+3 = <<44+3=51>>51 years old
The total age of Jeremy and Sebastian in three years will be 51+43 = <<51+43=94>>94
If the total age of Jeremy, Sebastian and Sophia in three years is 150, then Sophia's age in three years will be 150-94 = <<150-94=56>>56

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 47, not 51. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
